The T1 engage motor operation is abnormal.

1) Enter SVC mode. Select the T1 engage motor test. (Diagnostics > Engine Diagnostics > Engine Test Routines) Push the start button and check the motor operation. 2) If the motor is not operational, a) Open the side cover. Check if the ITB connector is connected correctly or is deformed. b) If the harness is defective, replace it. c) Remove the ITB unit from the machine.
